ANU.name: Seán  Kerins
ANU.colleges: College of Arts and Social Sciences
expertise: Aboriginal And Torres Strait Islander Policy
interest: Seán has a background in applied anthropology and Indigenous policy. His research interests are community-based management of natural resources, common property rights, common property resource institutions, subsistence, political ecology, and community-based development.
